CustomField.description: The parameter in the header that is being used to pass the digest signature of the payload. Example, for Github, the header parameter is "X-Hub-Signature-256"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The parameter in the header that is being used to pass the digest signature of the payload. Example, for Github, the header parameter is "X-Hub-Signature-256"
CustomField.label: Header Signature Parameter
